title: Payback - an e-commerce site
description: This pet project is an e-commerce store where users can buy and sell products. In addition, users can leave reviews of purchased products and communicate with each other using the built-in messenger.

title: Navigatio - a CLI app
description: This application allows you to quickly navigate between folders. It supports commands such as creating an alias for a folder, deleting an alias, showing all aliases, going to the specified folder, changing settings, showing all available commands and canceling the previous command.
